title: Pumpkin ice cream
ingredients: ['230g pumpkin puree', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 vanilla pod, seeds scraped out', '475ml double cream, divided', '170g dark brown soft sugar, divided', '5 very fresh egg yolks', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1 pinch salt', '1 pinch ground nutmeg']
